Projects

Project 1: How does hardware work?

Description: First SITE Project, where we learned about logic gates’ structure, boolean algebra(AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR) and digital circuit. The best of it was hand experience and has practice of doing it, compared to other projects, where there was only theory.

Technologies Used:

  • Breadboard with all curcuits and components
  • Arduino
  • 4 Brains
  • Patience

Features:

  • Team Work
  • Hard Skills
  • Interpersonal Relationship

Video:

Project 2: Hour Of Code

Description: Second SITE Project, where we went to school and taught school students about Algorithms and AI. I think, it was remarkable particularly, due to the experience of the teaching and also due to the place we visited.

Main Components:

  • Car
  • Camera
  • Laptops
  • Projector
  • Desire to learn something

Features:

  • Team Work
  • Teaching
  • Learning, as you need to understand the topic to convey it, like you are explaining it to 5 years old

Project 3: Personal Website

Description: Currently, you are sitting in it. The Goal of this project is to learn how GitHub and Git works, as even a person with no coding skills can do it, but the main problem of this project is learning the Workflow of the GitHub and its system of branches and commits
